original_text: I will write on the new stones the same words that I wrote on the first stones. You broke those stones. But you must put the new stones into the wooden box.’
korean_text: 네가 깨뜨린 처음 판에 쓴 말을 내가 그 판에 쓰리니 너는 그것을 그 궤에 넣으라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: I will write on the new stones
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 새 돌판 위에 글을 쓸 것이다

sentences.original_text: the same words that I wrote
the new stones into the wooden box.
